subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michael Letzig birdied three of the final six holes for a two-under-par 70 that gave him the lead in the Ginn sur Mer Classic in Palm Coast, Fla., when Ryan Palmer found water on the final hole. David Duval, within two shots of the lead going into the third round, shot a 74 and is tied for 14th. ¶Lee Westwood, a contender for the European Tour’s Order of Merit, trailed the co-leaders Soren Kjeldsen and Sergio García by one stroke when heavy rain stopped play for the second consecutive day at the Volvo Masters in Sotogrande, Spain. Westwood won the Order of Merit, the European money title, eight years ago and can overtake this year’s leader, Robert Karlsson, by capturing the tournament. westwood (AP).
